DOC.brief_summary: The objective study twofold : 1 ) Evaluate intra-operative sensing may assist surgeon tibiofemoral rotational alignment test precision variability set tray rotation mid-third tibial tubercle . 2 ) Understand patient combine axial rotation couple tibiofemoral joint quantitative intercompartmental balance , achieve use VERASENSE , exhibit less post-operative knee pain improve clinical outcome . Radiographic outcomes also assessed measure post-operative alignment evaluate prevalence location radiolucency and/or osteolysis .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Clinical Study Evaluating Tibiofemoral Rotational Alignment Using Intraoperative Sensing During TKA
DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis : TKA VERASENSE result reliable precise option establish implant-to-implant congruency joint balance lead less knee pain , fast return normal activity higher patient satisfaction compare TKA without VERASENSE .
